BRAND_NAME.description: The name of your organisaion, or a name to appear in the banner of the website.

DJANGO_ADMIN_USER_PASSWORD.description: A password for the default 'admin' user

DJANGO_ADMIN_USER_EMAIL.description: The email address for the default 'admin' user

TWILIO_ID.description: Your Twilio ID (optional; required for SMS and phone calls). See https://www.twilio.com/help/faq/twilio-basics/what-is-the-auth-token-and-how-can-it-be-reset for details.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Your AWS KEY ID (optional; required for study images and user-file uploads).

AWS_STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME.description: The AWS bucket to use for file storage (optional).
